name: Deal Breaker
description:
Deal Breaker is a 2D story-driven, action game where business-men must fight each other for their companies.

It's a ruthless, horror parody of capitalism and the harsh work environment! Partnering with shady allies and facing off against an overwhelming corporate force. You must make your way up the ranks, building your own business whilst destroying others in 1 on 1 combat. 

🩸 Story-Driven
🩸 2D Action Fighting gameplay
🩸 Witness the horrors of capitalism first hand!

Can't wait to hear your interpretations of the ending and the game's meaning! If you'd like to support me and the studio please check out our website www.elbahistudios.com and leave a comment!
